name: Tagliolini di montagna
desc: Noodles in a meat and vegetable sauce. The sauce has a rustic flavor, and there's a generous amount of it mixed in with the noodles. A humble but enduringly popular dish.

value.name: Ricetta: Tagliolini di montagna
value.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Noodles with Mountain Delicacies.

value.name: Fungo
value.desc: Hardy common fungi. Can grow anywhere with the right amount of shade and moisture.

value.name: Pezzo di carne cruda
value.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

value.name: Farina
value.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

value.name: Tagliolini di montagna deliziosi
value.desc: Noodles in a meat and vegetable sauce. The seemingly ordinary noodles have absorbed the essence of the mountainous delicacies. A single mouthful is enough to taste its extreme freshness.

value.name: Tagliolini di montagna sospetti
value.desc: Noodles in a meat and vegetable sauce. The moisture has been sucked right out of this dish, causing the noodles to become dry. You might choke on them even if you chew slowly.

value.name: Chongyun
value.desc: Il giovane erede di una famiglia di esorcisti. Fa tutto il possibile per sopprimere la sua abbondanza di energia yang.

value.name: Tagliolini di montagna freddi
value.desc: La specialità di Chongyun. Sebbene questi tagliolini siano un piatto irresistibile durante l'estate soffocante, Chongyun insiste nel mangiarli anche durante i periodi più freddi dell'inverno. Che tipo.
